document_data.mainbody:
Dualdons Wake was a small but important cargo ship from the town of Targos in Icewind Dale, active in the early 14 century DR.
Dualdons Wake was a long two-masted cargo ship with its name proudly inscribed on the hull.
Circa the , the Dualdons Wake sailed the waters of Maer Dualdon and the Shaengarne River. When Targos became besieged by the goblin and orc forces of the Legion of the Chimera in Mirtul of the , Dualdons Wake was used to transport lumber from Lonelywood to Targos for the construction of defensive palisades. The ship was targeted by goblin arsonists trying to cripple Targos by destroying its docks, but the invaders were slaughtered by a group of adventurers from Luskan, and the ship was defended by a member of the Targos Guard named Crandall.
